PowerPoint, MS. Word & MS. Excel.         - Fluency in both spoken & written English is a must besides the local language of Marathi & Hindi.         - The applicant must be ready to work on rotational shifts including night shifts, stay beyond duty hours to complete assigned tasks if asked by Reporting Manager. column2: This position is responsible for managing the overall Medical Services of the New Vista (NV) Business of HCL Healthcare and ensuring clinical and service excellence, while supporting capacity enhancement and quality assurance activities           Job Description          Facilitate ensuring end-to-end clinical and service excellence by the NV clinical team, which primarily includes doctors (General Physicians) and nurses.     Support the initial evaluation of prospective candidates, including participation in the clinical (technical) round of the recruitment process for hiring NV doctors.     Facilitate the induction of the new NV team members.     Plan and conduct post-induction training and other capacity enhancement activities for the NV team members. Maintaining good rapport and warm connect with them is crucial, especially during the initial 90 days of their onboarding.     Carry out concurrent and onsite monitoring and evaluation; provide supportive supervision; and offer technical insights and support for process improvement. A minimum 25% of the time in this role will be spent traveling to the onsite clinics at various NV locations.     In case of contingency, must be ready to take the role of on ground Doctor at client location / NV Clinic.     Work closely with internal stakeholders, including the Central Quality, NV Business Operations, HR, LD, EMRBusiness Analytics, and the on-ground clinic teams at various NV locations (onsite clinics).      Create/ update SOP documentation for the NV Business. Liaise with NV Clients to provide periodic updates, technical support, and other inputs related to clinical and service excellence for the NV Business of HCL Healthcare     Analyse relevant data; provide technical support and inputs for preparing reports and dashboards; and make periodic presentations to key stakeholders on observations, actions, and further planning and insights.       Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including:     o Central Quality   o HR   o LD   o NV Business and Operations   o All NV onsite clinics   o EMR Business Analytics         Educational Qualification: MBBS
column11: Manager Quality Assurance, Process improvement, Business analytics, Service excellence, Healthcare, Doctor, Capacity enhancement, Monitoring, Technical support, Business operations

column2: Equipment Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance, inspections, and repairs on mechanical, electrical, or electronic equipment and systems to prevent breakdowns and ensure optimal performance     Troubleshooting: Diagnose technical problems, identify root causes, and implement corrective actions to resolve equipment malfunctions or failures     Preventive Maintenance: Follow scheduled maintenance plans to conduct routine servicing, lubrication, calibration, and adjustments to extend equipment lifespan and prevent unplanned downtime     Equipment Installation: Install, assemble, and set up new equipment, ensuring proper alignment, connections, and functionality     Emergency Repairs: Respond to emergency repair requests promptly to minimize production or operational disruptions     Equipment Upgrades: Assist in equipment upgrades, retrofits, or modifications to enhance performance, safety, or efficiency

column2: Job Description:         Evaluation and management of problems of patients and families requiring palliative care with particular attention to social issues.         Auditing of palliative patient care with intent to identification of problems and bringing up possible solutions to problems to the attention of the administration.         Taking part in on-going research activities or initiating need based research programs with the approval of scientific committee.         Liaising with the Government departments for getting Scheme related information for the patients.         Taking steps to publish reports/data from audits or research programs with the objective of improved patient care anywhere.         Maintaining regular reporting to superior officials as advised in the contract.         Attending (first) and organizing (later) educational programs on behalf of Pallium India.         Maintaining good relations with clients, donors, well-wishers and staff during telephone conversations, email contacts, personal contacts or any other.
